C

CAN_BE_FERTILIZED - game.GroundCapability
A Ground is capable of being fertilized.
CAN_BE_HARVESTED - game.GroundCapability
A Ground is capable of being harvested.
CAN_BE_SOWED_ON - game.GroundCapability
A Ground is capable of being sowed on it.
canActorEnter(Actor) - Method in class game.Fence
 
Corpse - Class in game
A corpse item which is portable and created when an actor is dead.
Corpse(String) - Constructor for class game.Corpse
Create a Corpse object using a String that specifies the name of the Corpse and a char that specifies the display character of the Corpse.
CRAFTABLE - game.ItemCapability
An Item is capable of being craftable.
CraftingAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action that allows actor to craft a weapon
CraftingAction(Item) - Constructor for class game.actions.CraftingAction
Creates a crafting action by using the item to be crafted
Crop - Class in game
A crop that ripes over time, can be sowed, fertilized when it is unripe and harvested when it is ripe.
Crop() - Constructor for class game.Crop
Create a Crop object using a char that specifies its display character for Crop, and adding the capability GroundCapability.CAN_BE_FERTILIZED.
